FuncDef:
The statistic enable command enables traffic statistics collection on an IPsec tunnel interface.
The undo statistic enable command disables traffic statistics collection on an IPsec tunnel interface.
By default, traffic statistics collection is not enabled on an IPsec tunnel interface.
ExtraInfo: To enable traffic statistics collection on an IPsec tunnel interface for QoS policy deployment or fault locating, run the statistic enable command. After IPsec SA negotiation succeeds, you can run the display this interface command on the tunnel interface to view IPsec traffic statistics.
